value:
$WmMPID_エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Are you children misbehaving in
here? Looks like I need to teach you
a lesson!$k$p

$WmMPID_メイ,ch10_16_May_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I can conjure lightning, you know. Big,
hurty lightning.$k$pTerrors or otherwise, suck it up and
get ready to fry!$k$p

$WmMPID_ティルテュ,ch06_08_Tailto_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I don't spend a lot of time thinking
about things I'm not interested in.$k$pBut I am interested in taking down
baddies with my magic!$k$p

$WmMPID_ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I wish I were more worthy, so that I
could help out more... That's why I
always have to do my best!$k$p

$WmMPID_サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Righteous or evil has never mattered
to me. I've always been quite good at
choosing who to hate on my own.$k$p
